version_description:
• ActiveCaptain routes sync: store your Routes into the ActiveCaptain community to share with other users and with all your devices, keep your Aqua Map in sync with your Active Captain Account.
• Improved compatibility with Facebook for data upload.

- Small improvements to benefit fully from iOS10
- Minor fixing

• We added the option to enable/disable the land data overlay
• With 2017 map update, we added detailed land data.
• Improved drawing speed on detailed zoom

- We introduce a new exclusive way to display the maps: mapXpan.
This new functionality will greatly expand your display; you will have the details you need for a safe navigation seamlessly integrated with a large overview area.

- Improved the Safety depth colouring
- Enhanced the GPS filtering for poor signal condition
- Solved a problem about wrong depth unit
- Solved a problem with the import of some KMZ

- Tested with iOS 11
- Added the Brazil and Argentinas areas
- Added ETA for Routes
- Added the possibility to subscribe to an area
- Minor bug fixing

- iPhone X compatible
- Added GPS Direction/Compass option for Heading Up Mode
- Added the number of the buoy on the map (for better buoy's identification)
- Minor improvements

- iOS 11, iPhone X and iPhone 8 compatible
- Solved an issue when taking photos from inside the App
- Minor improvements

- iOS 11, iPhone X and iPhone 8 compatible
- Minor improvements

• Greatly improved Map Info pop-up, adding the possibility to select and manage multiple objects.
• Improved the Around You tab in the Search page, now you can search and manage also User Data and ActiveCaptain objects
• Added date and time for track in the Map Info popup
• Now Track and Route line width can be changed
• Some small improvements

• Solved a problem with Reversed route
• Improved ActiveCaptain search
• Some small improvements

• Added the Tides & Currents prediction (now only in US)
• Added the Tides & Currents trend simulation (now only in US)
• Improved Route sharing and import
• Some small improvements

• Solved a problem with Current icons in Head up mode (rotated map)
• Added special icons for "user buoy"
• Some small improvements

• Added charts for Europe & New Zealand
• Some small improvements
• Some small improvements
• Some small improvements
• Some small improvements

• Added the possibility to duplicate a Route
• Improved Around You tab with T&C info
• Some small improvements

• Improved GPX import
• Solved a problem when updating the maps
• Some small improvements

• The ActiveCaptain service has been deeply restructured and this application now uses the new version of the service. 
NOTE: old service stop to work on May 23rd
• Improved the management of your own data. Now you can search selectively Markers, Tracks or Routes.
• Some minor improvements

• Solved a crash with iPhoneX
• Some small improvements

• Improved map clarity reducing text clutter
• Some small improvement on ActiveCaptain update process

• Solved a problem of wrong date in the ActiveCaptain update
• Some small improvements

In the last months we added (for free) the T&C management, the new ActiveCaptain service, the Waterway Guide service and the Anchor Alarm; we are now working hard to remove all the small issues and adding some small improvements.
• Small improvements
• Solved an issue with Waterway Guide update

• Solved an issue when adding photo to markers
• Added the possibility to disable the Auto-Hide of the buttons on the map
• Some small improvements
• Fixed an issue for GPX file import

• Added possibility to have HTTP Get & Post for Anchor Alarm events
• Added fuel type in "My Boat" page 
• Corrected a problem related to "Internet not available"

• Improved internationalization management
• Some minor improvements

• Improved visibility for Anchor Alarm circle
• Improved display for Waterway Guide alerts with images
• Improved behaviour in iPad Multiscreen mode
• Added the automatic starting waypoint detection for routes
• Solved some minor bugs

• Improved internationalization management
• Some minor improvements

• Added Australia charts
• Improved iPhone XS Max landscape mode
• Minor improvements

We introduced the Aqua Map Master functionalities to transform your device in a real ChartPlotter:

► Use and display information from external NMEA and SignalK devices through WiFi
► Overlay USACE surveys (only US) on top of your charts
► Consult the new Route Explorer with bridges, hazards and best fuel prices calculation (where community info are available)
► Display AIS info from external devices with automatic collision detection

We also improved the existing functions:
• Added the possibility to display the name of the Markers on the map
• Selectable icon size for Markers and Community info
• Improved setting page
• Editing of name and coordinates for the Route waypoints
• Added the compass info on the screen when in Head-up mode

Use the Aqua Map Master functionalities to transform your device in a real ChartPlotter:
► Use and display information from external NMEA and SignalK devices through WiFi
► Overlay USACE surveys (only US) on top of your charts
► Consult the new Route Explorer with bridges, hazards and best fuel prices calculation (where community info are available)
► Display AIS info from external devices with automatic collision detection

In this version we solved some bugs.

• Greatly improved the search functionality
• Added more than 12000 contours map for lakes in US & Canada
• Some minor improvements

• Improved Track graph (depth and speed) functionality. Now you can "Show on Map" a specific point in the graph.
• Solved an issue related to the Compass window
• Solved some redrawing issues for tracks

• Added the possibility to highlight Waypoints and Route Explorer points. When you highlight them, you can have on the map the distance and ETA of your highlighted waypoints (in addition to the next one).
• Added the option to select the file format (KMZ or GPX) when exporting your Routes, Markers and Tracks.
• Changed position (on ipad) of Route navigation windows to improve iPad readability.
• Extended chart coverage to Mediterranean France and Bermuda.

... plus some bug fixing

• Solved an issue related to Bearing in the Anchor Alarm position settings
• Some minor improvements
• Solved a problem when sharing the user data on an iPad

• Added a dedicated "My Boat" page with possibility to customize the icon, size, height, type, ...
• Now RouteExplorer will use Height and Beam of the boat to detect dangerous bridges.
• Added the Distance Markers (also known as Mile Markers) in the Search
• Improved Current textual description.
•Solved a problem related to AIS filtering

• Added possibility to have HTTP Get & Post for Anchor Alarm events
• Added fuel type in "My Boat" page 
• Corrected a problem related to "Internet not available"

• Solved an issue for Route info box on iPhone
• Fixed missing boat icon (for special boats) in Anchor Alarm
• Solved a problem related to UDP connections
• Some minor improvements
• Quick bug fix update to improve your Aqua Map experience.
• Quick bug fix update to improve your Aqua Map experience.
• Fixed an issue for GPX file import
• Solved a problem with the satellite overlay

• Improved GPS when in background with iOS 13
• Solved a NMEA connection issue with recent models

Aqua Map is proud to announce a big step ahead in its mapping technology. 

• NEW MAP ENGINE: we drastically improved our map engine. A much faster and smoother redrawing, Perspective view, optimized boat position, texts and symbols rotations, reduced storage size on the device and much more are now available in your favorite Navigation app.
ATTENTION: in order to achieve this, we had to change the map format and so, when you update the app, it is mandatory that you re-download all your charts. 

• LIGHT/DARK MODE: the app is now fully compliant with iOS 13 Light/Dark aspect management, you can select the desired behaviour inside the app Settings page. 
Note: to use this feature you need iOS 13.0 or newer.

• Solved a problem of compatibility with iOS 10
• Some minor fixes and improvements
• Fixed an issue with the subscription expiring incorrectly

Great NEWS !!
• Added the USCG List of lights and USCG LNM. Daily updates into the App directly from the USCG database.
• Added the possibility to navigate a Track (normally or reversed)
• Added the possibility to get all the Route Explorer information also for a Track
• Improved the Route Explorer functionality adding the Anchorages and all the Marinas (not only with Fuel).
• Improved Waterway Guide and ActiveCaptain POIs drawing to identify marinas with fuel

Great NEWS !!
• Added the USCG List of lights and USCG LNM. Daily updates into the App directly from the USCG database.
• Added the possibility to navigate a Track (normally or reversed)
• Added the possibility to get all the Route Explorer information also for a Track
• Improved the Route Explorer functionality adding the Anchorages and all the Marinas (not only with Fuel).
• Improved Waterway Guide and ActiveCaptain POIs drawing to identify marinas with fuel
• Some small improvements
• Added Norway to the list of purchasable areas

• Added ATON and SART management for AIS data
• Improved map readability (fonts size and buoys size)

• Great improvement: Map visibility
From the Setting page you can now access to a new page that will allow you to fine tune all the icons and text sizes on the map. You can now customize the map drawing for your use and preference.

• New improved help
• Improved current station visibility
• Small improvements
• Minor improvements and bug fixing
• Solved an hang when taking photo inside the App in the iPads

• Fully compatible with iOS 14
• A new method "Live Anchoring" is available to set the anchor position (for the anchor alarm).
• Solved an issue causing a crash when navigating a Route with RouteExplorer active.
• Some minor fixings
• Solved an issue related to AIS through WiFi.

• Added the Tide stations for the Bahamas
• Added the Tide stations for Australia
